data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article De Mello-Patiu, Cátia A. (2015): A remarkable structure in a peculiar species of Sarcophagidae (Diptera): description of the male of Lepidodexia (Harpagopyga) albida Lopes. Zootaxa 4000 (1): 147-150, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4000.1.10
